name: xmlFormat
description:
Escapes special XML characters in a string, so that the
 string is safe to use with XML.

examples.title: Basic xmlFormat() usage
examples.description: In this example we demonstrate passing the invalid characters < and & into the xmlFormat() function to make them XML safe.

examples.title: Advanced xmlFormat() usage
examples.description: In this example we demonstrate parsing the cfdocs.org index page into xmlFormat() to make it safe for XML storage.
